channel.title: Macroeconomics on Hyojun Jung's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Macroeconomics on Hyojun Jung's Blog

item.title: Forecasting Tourism Demand with PVAR
item.description:
This research project uses Panel VAR models to predict international tourist arrivals, incorporating macro indicators:

  • Google Trends, exchange rates, GDP per capita
  • Country–quarter panel (2007–2023)
  • Evaluated using RMSE against 2024 actuals
